title: Definition of Statistic
text: The statistic is the measured value from the sample. It measures exactly the same thing as the parameter does, just for a subset of the population.

title: Identitfying Statistic
text: What is the statistic of the study? Essentially, what is the calculated value that you want to determine for the smaller sample? Is it the POPULATION average amount of money spent on school uniforms each year by families with children at Knoll Academy or the SAMPLE average amount of money spent on school uniforms each year by families with children at Knoll Academy?
